Title: Persevere in acting according to the Sixteen Points of the Central Committee of the Party
Designer: Central Art Academy Blockprint combat group (中央美术学院版画战斗组)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The young Red Guard holds a brochure "中国共产党中央委员会 - 关于无产阶级文化大革命的决定" (Decision of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party Concerning the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution), published late 1966. This text consists of sixteen 'points'.
